quotes.message: Where there is unity there is always victory.
quotes.name: Publilius Syrus

quotes.message: For victory in life, we've got to keep focused on the goal, and the goal is Heaven.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat for it is momentary.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: The best victory is when the opponent surrenders of its own accord before there are any actual hostilitiesâ€¦It is best to win without fighting.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Victory is the beautiful, bright-colored flower. Transport is the stem without which it could never have blossomed.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The victory of success is half won when one gains the habit of setting goals and achieving them.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: Victory is much more meaningful when it comes not just from one person, but from the joint achievements of many.
quotes.name: Howard Schultz

quotes.message: The first place we must win the victory is in our own minds. If you don't think you can be successful, then you never will be.
quotes.name: Joel Osteen

quotes.message: The problems of victory are more agreeable than those of defeat, but they are no less difficult.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: This victory alone is not the change we seek; it is only the chance for us to make that change.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Victory belongs to those that believe in it the most and believe in it the longest.
quotes.name: Randall Wallace

quotes.message: Victory goes to the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
quotes.name: Savielly Grigorievitch Tartakower

quotes.message: The only victories which leave no regret are those which are gained over ignorance.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: Yes, victory is sweet, but it doesn't necessarily make life any easier the next season or even the next day.
quotes.name: Phil Jackson

quotes.message: Victory usually goes to the army who has better trained officers and men.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: It's a story about victory that will touch the lives of everyone who watches it. It's powerful.
quotes.name: Derek Luke

quotes.message: Victories that are easy are cheap. Those only are worth having which come as the result of hard fighting.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: The victory is always sweeter... winning things with friends.
quotes.name: Brian O'Driscoll

quotes.message: Victory is about recognizing all the work that went into achieving your dream.
quotes.name: Tommy Hilfiger

quotes.message: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.message: The moment of victory is much too short to live for that and nothing else.
quotes.name: Martina Navratilova

quotes.message: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: The victory over our inner self is a daily struggle. Be strong and do not give up.
quotes.name: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.message: Victory is won not in miles but in inches. Win a little now, hold your ground, and later, win a little more.
quotes.name: Louis L'Amour

quotes.message: Victory isn't defined by wins or losses. It is defined by effort. If you can truthfully say, 'I did the best I could, I gave everything I had,' then you're a winner.
quotes.name: Wolfgang Schadler

quotes.message: To win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: If fighting is sure to result in victory, then you must fight, even though the ruler forbid it; if fighting will not result in victory, then you must not fight even at the ruler's bidding.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: Victory is everything. You can spend the money but you can never spend the memories.
quotes.name: Ken Venturi

quotes.message: The great victory, which appears so simple today, was the result of a series of small victories that went unnoticed
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: All victories breed hate, and that over your superior is foolish or fatal.
quotes.name: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.message: Victory is akin to ecstasy. It takes us past the limits of our ordinary happiness, while it also lets a sometimes vulgar lust for winning keep us company.
quotes.name: D.S. Carroll

quotes.message: Victory is in the quality of the competition, not just the final score.
quotes.name: Mike Marshall

quotes.message: One victory more or less doesn't make the difference for me now.
quotes.name: Hermann Maier

quotes.message: It's a victory that extends way beyond the borders of the Bitterroot Forest. It ensures the public will have meaningful input on Forest Service projects across the country.
quotes.name: Larry Campbell

quotes.message: Victory comes only to those prepared to make it, and take it.
quotes.name: Tom Clancy

quotes.message: Victory takes sides on people who are more compatible with nature and future.
quotes.name: Toba Beta

quotes.message: Victory is sweetest when you've known defeat.
quotes.name: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.message: Your victory is right around the corner. Never give up.
quotes.name: Nicki Minaj

quotes.message: The greatest victory a man can win is victory over himself.
quotes.name: Johann Heinrich Pestalozzi

quotes.message: The secret of all victory lies in the organization of the non-obvious.
quotes.name: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.message: The ultimate victory in competition is derived from the inner satisfaction of knowing that you have done your best and that you have gotten the most out of what you had to give.
quotes.name: Howard Cosell

quotes.message: There's a victory and defeat-the first and best of victories, the lowest and worst of defeats-which each man gains or sustains at the hands not of another, but of himself.
quotes.name: Plato

quotes.message: This is a total victory, everything we requested from the court. We did not want any confidential source to be identified and we did not want to produce any reporter's notes. That's what the judge provided.
quotes.name: Ralph Kates

quotes.message: Victory in physical battles requires strength, muscles, and skill; but the fight is never tougher and victory is never sweeter than in the battles over self.
quotes.name: John Bytheway

quotes.message: Victory at all costs, victory in spite of all terror, victory however long and hard the road may be; for without victory there is no survival.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The greatest victory for man is not that his dreams were fulfilled but it is that to stand upright even when none of his dreams were fulfilled!.
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: There is no defeat in death...Victory comes in defending what we know is right while we still live.
quotes.name: Alfred

quotes.message: Victory over oneself is the primary goal of our training. We focus on the spirit rather than the form, the kernel rather than the shell.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: By yielding you may obtain victory.
quotes.name: Ovid

quotes.message: On the day of victory, no one is tired.
quotes.name: Arabian Proverb

quotes.message: Forewarned, forearmed; to be prepared is half the victory.
quotes.name: Cervantes

quotes.message: They got the better of themselves, and that's the best kind of victory one can wish for.
quotes.name: Cervantes

quotes.message: With kindness conquer rage; with goodness, malice; with generosity defeat all meanness; with the straight truth defeat lies and deceit.
quotes.name: Mahabharata

quotes.message: Tomorrow's victory shall crown the conflict of today.
quotes.name: Martin Tupper

quotes.message: The important thing in life is not the victory but the contest; the essential thing is not to have won but to have fought well.
quotes.name: Baron Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.message: What is the victory of a cat on a hot tin roof?— I wish I knew...Just staying on it, I guess, as long as she can.
quotes.name: Tennessee Williams

quotes.message: More than you seek to defeat the enemy, seek his foe! More than you seek victory, seek the Victor! You'll never be more beautiful to God than when He can look down and see you hanging on to Him for dear life.
quotes.name: Beth Moore

quotes.message: Victory in a great cause is measured not only by reaching the final goal. It is also a triumph to live up to expectations in your lifetime.
quotes.name: Nelson Mandela

quotes.message: Victory in war is the first and greatest goal before us. Victory in peace is the next. That means striving toward the enlargement of the security of man here and throughout the world— and, finally, striving for the fourth freedom— Freedom for fear.
quotes.name: Bryan Curtis

quotes.message: There never has been—there never can be a successful compromise between good and evil. Only total victory can reward the champions of tolerance and decency and freedom and faith.
quotes.name: Bryan Curtis

quotes.message: There is no victory at bargain-basement prices.
quotes.name: Bryan Curtis

quotes.message: We seek victory—not over any nation or people—but over the ancient enemies of us all; victory over ignorance, poverty, disease, anf human degradation wherever they may be found.
quotes.name: Byan Curtis

quotes.message: Know the enemy, know yourself; your victory will never be endangered. Know the ground, know the weather; your victory will then be total.
quotes.name: Sun Tzu

quotes.message: In defeat unbeatable; in victory unbearable.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: An error gracefully acknowledged is a victory won.
quotes.name: Caroline Gascoigne

quotes.message: After a grand victory in a grand war, the hardest battle to fight is the first little skirmish of the next campaign.
quotes.name: Pat Riley

quotes.message: Motivate by inches. Better to begin with small victories than large frustrations.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: When you win, say nothing. When you lose, say less.
quotes.name: Paul Brown

quotes.message: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour is that moment when he has worked his heart out in good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle victorious.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: Life's battles don't always go to the stronger or the faster man. But sooner or later the man who wins, is the man who thinks he can.
quotes.name: Vince Lombardi

quotes.message: He got the better of himself, and that's the best kind of victory one can wish for.
quotes.name: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.message: Each victory must be applauded, because it is so easy not to battle at all, to just accept and call that acceptance is inevitable
quotes.name: Audre Lorde

quotes.message: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours.
quotes.name: Buddha

quotes.message: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is the victory over self.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: In war, there is no substitute for victory
quotes.name: Gen. Douglas MacArthur

quotes.message: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.name: Winston Churchill

quotes.message: It is the triumph over one's own nature that means full victory; for when a man has himself under control so that every desire submits to reason and reason submits to me, then he is really victorious over self, and is master of the world.
quotes.name: Thomas a' Kempis
